title: Behind The Idea #77: SaaS on SaaS And The PagerDuty Short
description: We speak with longtime Seeking Alpha author and tech investor Akram's Razor about the software as a service (SAAS) sector and how it is changing with everybody already a believer in the cloud and subscription models. We focus on PagerDuty and the newly public company's tough competitive landscape, and why Atlassian may be twisting the screws on it.
itunes:title: SaaS on SaaS and the PagerDuty Short With Akram's Razor
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: History may be rhyming in the tech sector, but there is less left over for public investors according to Akram's Razor.
itunes:summary: We speak with longtime Seeking Alpha author and tech investor Akram's Razor about the software as a service (SAAS) sector and how it is changing with everybody already a believer in the cloud and subscription models. We focus on PagerDuty and the newly public company's tough competitive landscape, and why Atlassian may be twisting the screws on it.
